Build things that matter.

Who am I?

Hello! I'm Jessie Albarian. A creative designer, mobile application and website developer, computer science student, coffee connoisseur, and adventurer. I am always looking for new projects to work on, and I love participating in technology and design events and conferences. I'm an artist at heart, so I find myself solving problems and working on projects with both my creativity and logical thinking. Check out some of my website and app projects below!

Mobile App Projects

BlueLight
A campus safety app complete in both Android and iOS: Java, XML, Swift, Android Studio, Xcode
Patches
An animal shelter app, with the Boulder Humane Society data, complete in both Android and iOS: Java, XML, Swift, Android Studio, Xcode
Avery Brewing
An Android app for Avery Brewing Company to show beers on tap and events: Java, XML, Android Studio
Campus App
An app for students at universities, specifically the CU schools, complete in Android and iOS: Java, XML, Swift, Firebase NoSQL Database, MapKit, Google Maps
iBeacon BLE App
Using Beacons and the iOS Estimote SDK, this iOS app demoed Beacon capabilities such as BLE, triangulation, and finding user location.
